ya10.2.1:544.2: Sabbesaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe upekkhāvippayuttañāṇavippayuttacittassa uppādakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ upekkhindriyañca na uppajjati paññindriyañca na uppajjati.

ya10.2.1:726.2: Sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ ahetukānaṃ na purisānaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saddhindriyañca na uppajjati purisindriyañca na uppajjati.

ya10.2.1:2707.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjittha tassa tattha upekkhindriyaṃ na uppajjissatīti?
ya10.2.1:2708.1: Suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāne tesaṃ tattha somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha upekkhindriyaṃ na uppajjissati.
ya10.2.1:2708.2: Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha somanassindriyañca na uppajjittha upekkhindriyañca na uppajjissati.
ya10.2.1:2709.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha upekkhindriyaṃ na uppajjissati tassa tattha somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjitthāti?
ya10.2.1:2710.1: Pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ yassa cittassa anantarā somanassasampayuttapacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati tesaṃ tattha upekkhindriyaṃ na uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjittha.
ya10.2.1:2710.2: Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha upekkhindriyañca na uppajjissati somanassindriyañca na uppajjittha.
ya10.2.1:2711.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjittha tassa tattha saddhindriyaṃ … pe … paññindriyaṃ … pe … manindriyaṃ na uppajjissatīti?
ya10.2.1:2712.1: Suddhāvāsānaṃ dutiye citte vattamāne tesaṃ tattha somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha manindriyaṃ na uppajjissati.
ya10.2.1:2712.2: Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha somanassindriyañca na uppajjittha manindriyañca na uppajjissati.
ya10.2.1:2713.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha manindriyaṃ na uppajjissati tassa tattha somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjitthāti?
ya10.2.1:2714.1: Pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ tattha manindriyaṃ na uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha somanassindriyaṃ na uppajjittha.
ya10.2.1:2714.2: Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manindriyañca na uppajjissati somanassindriyañca na uppajjittha.
ya10.2.1:2715.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha upekkhindriyaṃ na uppajjittha tassa tattha saddhindriyaṃ … pe … paññindriyaṃ … pe … manindriyaṃ na uppajjissatīti?
ya10.2.1:2716.1: Suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha upekkhindriyaṃ na uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha manindriyaṃ na uppajjissati.
ya10.2.1:2716.2: Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha upekkhindriyañca na uppajjittha manindriyañca na uppajjissati.
ya10.2.1:2717.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha manindriyaṃ na uppajjissati tassa tattha upekkhindriyaṃ na uppajjitthāti?
ya10.2.1:2718.1: Pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ tattha manindriyaṃ na uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha upekkhindriyaṃ na uppajjittha.
ya10.2.1:2718.2: Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manindriyañca na uppajjissati upekkhindriyañca na uppajjittha.
ya10.2.1:2719.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha saddhindriyaṃ na uppajjittha tassa tattha paññindriyaṃ  … pe … manindriyaṃ na uppajjissatīti?
ya10.2.1:2720.1: Suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saddhindriyaṃ na uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha manindriyaṃ na uppajjissati.
ya10.2.1:2720.2: Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saddhindriyañca na uppajjittha manindriyañca na uppajjissati.
ya10.2.1:2721.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha manindriyaṃ na uppajjissati tassa tattha saddhindriyaṃ na uppajjitthāti?
ya10.2.1:2722.1: Pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ tattha manindriyaṃ na uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha saddhindriyaṃ na uppajjittha.
ya10.2.1:2722.2: Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manindriyañca na uppajjissati saddhindriyañca na uppajjittha.
ya10.2.1:2723.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha paññindriyaṃ na uppajjittha tassa tattha manindriyaṃ na uppajjissatīti?
ya10.2.1:2724.1: Suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha paññindriyaṃ na uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha manindriyaṃ na uppajjissati.
ya10.2.1:2724.2: Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha paññindriyañca na uppajjittha manindriyañca na uppajjissati.
ya10.2.1:2725.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha manindriyaṃ na uppajjissati tassa tattha paññindriyaṃ na uppajjitthāti?
ya10.2.1:2726.1: Pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ tattha manindriyaṃ na uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha paññindriyaṃ na uppajjittha.
ya10.2.1:2726.2: Asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha manindriyañca na uppajjissati paññindriyañca na uppajjittha.
